title: A pleasant comedie, shewing the contention betweene liberalitie and prodigalitie As it was playd before her Maiestie.
publisher: Printed by Simon Stafford, for George Vincent: and are to be sold at the signe of the Hand in hand in Wood-street ouer against S. Michaels Church,
notes: Running title reads: The contention betweene liberalitie and prodigalitie.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
